facilities.title: Conference Room
facilities.text: A spacious conference room with large seating area for up to 200 people. It includes a projector, whiteboard, and a sound system.

facilities.title: Meeting Room
facilities.text: A large meeting room with a large seating area for up to 100 people. It includes a projector, whiteboard, and a sound system.

facilities.title: Executive Lounge
facilities.text: A luxurious space for relaxation and networking. Features comfortable seating and beverages. Ideal for unwinding or business meetings.

testimonialSection.name: John Doe
testimonialSection.description: This residence has been a great experience for my business. I highly recommend it to others.

testimonialSection.name: Jane Smith
testimonialSection.description: I have always wanted to stay in a luxury hotel. This residence has made my dream come true.

testimonialSection.name: Mike Johnson
testimonialSection.description: I can't believe I found this perfect place for my new business. I can't wait to share my experiences with others.

testimonialSection.name: Sarah Williams
testimonialSection.description: I'm so thrilled to have found this residence. The staff is friendly and the location is perfect for my business.

testimonialSection.name: David Brown
testimonialSection.description: I'm so grateful for the chance to stay in this residence. The location is perfect for my business.

testimonialSection.name: Michael Davis
testimonialSection.description: I'm so happy I found this residence. The location is perfect for my business.
